page.title: 10BERRINGTON C.E. SCHOOL (2)
page.content: The church clock striking{9am}signals school to begin.{Assembly}with hymn, prayers and a chat takes place nearly every day before the children split into{2 classes}to do language or number work or an activity connected to the topic being studied that term. Morning{playtime}is for 15 minutes and is taken at about 11am. At noon,{lunch time begins. Only 6 children have {school dinners}(60p each) which are eaten in the Parish Hall across the road. The dinners are cooked at Holy Cross School, Shrewsbury and 3 local ladies assist at this meal time. The other 20 children bring their own {packed lunches}and drinks from home. At about 12.30 the children go back in the schoolyard or in school to play. School work begins again at 1pm. and continues until{3.30pm.
